title: Ewing on Racial Justice, Thompson's Legacy & the NBA
itunes:title: Ewing on Racial Justice, Thompson's Legacy & the NBA
description:
NBA Hall of Famer, gold medal-winning Olympian, and Georgetown Hoyas Head Coach Patrick Ewing joins the podcast to talk about the legacy of fellow hall of famer and Georgetown Hoyas coach, John Thompson. Ewing speaks with Jason and Lynch about the impact Thompson had on his career, professional sports, and society at large. They also talk about the difficulties of coaching and recruiting during the pandemic, and Ewing weighs in on the New York City Mayoral race.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
